description.en: A group of psychiatric patients find a UN humanitarian drop containing military uniforms and form a small army unit under the command of a mute colonel.
description.bg: Група психиатрични пациенти намират хуманитарна пратка на ООН, съдържаща военни униформи, и сформират малка армейска част под командването на ням полковник.
description.es: Un grupo de pacientes psiquiátricos encuentra un cargamento humanitario de la ONU que contiene uniformes militares y forma una pequeña unidad del ejército bajo el mando de un coronel mudo.
description.de: Eine Gruppe psychiatrischer Patienten findet eine UN-Hilfslieferung mit Militäruniformen und bildet eine kleine Armeeeinheit unter dem Kommando eines stummen Obersts.

languages.name: English
languages.text:
In a small psychiatric ward situated in a former monastery and lost somewhere in the mountains in the Balkans, six patients and a very young doctor are left to their fate. In the winter they are completely snow-bound and lost to the world; left with out food, heating or pharmaceuticals. They even have to gather together in a single room, to avoid freezing to death. At the fatal moment when the patients are facing their hungry and cold death, UN planes heading from Bosnia, having lost their way in a winter storm during the night, drop humanitarian aid by mistake. The parcels contain food and military uniforms for clothes.

The next morning one of the patients, a former military man, who has remained speechless for the past three years, approaches - shaved, trim and dapper in a military uniform. His compelling behaviour very quickly provokes the patients' military reflexes and they gradually remember life in the barracks, and eventually adapt themselves to it. The strict military discipline makes them forget their illness and transforms them into a combat military unit. In act of gratitude for UN assistance, they decide to join NATO. Dresses up as "Blue helmets" they start to western Europe...

description.en: A chaotic look into a hospital where the staff is as confused as the patients.
description.bg: Хаотичен поглед към болница, където персоналът е също толкова объркан, колкото и пациентите.
description.es: Una mirada caótica a un hospital donde el personal está tan confundido como los pacientes.
description.de: Ein chaotischer Blick in ein Krankenhaus, in dem das Personal ebenso verwirrt ist wie die Patienten.

languages.name: English
languages.text: An unidentified patient, who has lost his memory, appears in a small district hospital in the deep countryside. Obviously a man of the soil he had been found in a state of shock beside a crashed NATO-aircraft. Not knowing his name, the doctors give name him after his diagnosis Contusio Cerebris. This strange "name" is a reason to be suspected of being the crashed American pilot by the other patients ( all of them are common people). Of course he doesn't speak English because he has it forgotten after the shock. Day after day they create for him the biography of a very important and rich military man, basing their fantasy on the myth of the Great America. In the beginning he doesn't believe it but little by little he begins to like this story. In finally they even invent his wife - a beautiful American actress. The man falls in love in his "wife" and constantly watches TV, hoping to recognize her. Being afraid of losing his memory again, he writes down his "biography" several times (to be safe). One of the other patients sends all the copies to the most famous word medias and "the sensation" blows up over the world. A special NATO-commission (searching for disappeared soldiers) arrives and hands him military cross "July The Fourth". The ceremony appears on the CNN-news… One day his wife arrives too. Unfortunately she isn't an actress but a modest village woman who has recognized her husband on TV. The meeting is either funny and tragic. The man refuses to accept the reality and continues to live in his inexistent but wonderful biography. Eventually Colonel Cerebris finds the wife of his dreams… This is the story of only one of the five main characters. All the others participate in it and have their own fortune.

description.en: Some people think that somewhere in the labyrinths there are people still alive, mutated descendants from the era of the Roman Empire...
description.bg: Някои хора смятат, че някои хора все още живеят под земята, мутираните наследници от епохата на Римската империя...
description.es: Algunas personas creen que en algún lugar en los laberintos hay personas aún vivas, descendientes mutantes de la era del Imperio Romano...
description.de: Einige Menschen glauben, dass irgendwo in den Labyrinthen Menschen noch leben, mutierte Nachkommen aus der Zeit des römischen Imperiums...

languages.name: English
languages.text: Beneath Rome, Napoli, Alexandria, Sicily and North Africa there are thousands of kilometers of subterranean catacombs. Some people think that somewhere in the labyrinths there are people still alive, mutated descendants from the era of the Roman Empire...

languages.name: English
languages.text:
Four tramps inhabit a deserted train station. They desperately wish to escape this godforsaken place. Under the despotic directorship of the criminal Meto, they endlessly train for Getting on the Train. But no trains stop at the deserted station. The tramps include: Luko: Ex-Stationmaster,Luba: An alcoholic and Doko: Who constantly weeps for his favorite dead bear, whose food he regularly sold for booze.

And so, their lives are wasted in endless rehearsals, drinking and grumbling about the dictatorial Meto, who presents himself as the famous conductor and intellectual Meto von Metonyan. A train stops one day, and throws off another alcoholic. The newcomer is wearing a worn top hat and tails and is deathly drunk. During the night, Meto kills him. The next morning, the horrified tramps see Meto wearing his tuxedo. Suddenly, the victim emerges from the station with a knife in his belly. Meto faints. Shaking with a hangover, the victim drinks a beer and comes to. He takes the knife out of his belly and introduces himself as… Harry Houdini, illusionist and showman. For a daily dose of alcohol, he promises to teach the drunks a great magic trick. In this way, they will escape that horrible place. Under the tutelage of the Great Illusionist, they begin their daily lessons.

In the meantime, strange things start happening at the station. The dead bear appears every night at the booth, selling tickets. Every ticket is for the 20th of August. Losing power, Meto attempts to reveal the Great Illusionist as a fraud. But, Harry proves the reality of his illusions. On August 20th, their train stops, they board and depart…and then, they realize that the train has neither passengers nor a conductor. Terrified, the tramps beg Harry to stop the train. He tells them that this is an illusion-train, a figment of their imagination that has no power over them. In this way, he reveals that the world does not exist and is only an illusion. As proof, Harry shows them something really impossible that could happen only in the imagination. He enters a metal box, and when they lift the lid, they find he has disappeared. To prove that this is just another trick, Luko enters the box. When the others lift the lid, they find he, too, has disappeared. And so, they disappear, one by one. Doko is the last to enter the box. He locks himself in, but cannot disappear. He tries again and again, with no result. Left alone, he decides that maybe he has disappeared without knowing it. And then, he realizes that disappearing maybe means being left alone…

title.en: The Colonel & The Birds (Female version of The Colonel Bird)
title.bg: Полковникът и птиците (Женски вариант на „Полковникът птица“)
title.es: El Coronel y los Pájaros (Versión femenina de El Coronel Pájaro)
title.de: Der Oberst und die Vögel (Weibliche Version von Der Oberst Vogel)

description.en: "The Colonel and the birds" - is an original female version of "The Colonel Bird". All the characters are women except the Colonel.
description.bg: "Полковникът и птиците" - е оригинална женска версия на "Полковникът птица". Всички персонажи са жени, освен Полковника.
description.es: "El Coronel y los Pájaros" - es una versión femenina original de "El Coronel Pájaro". Todos los personajes son mujeres excepto el Coronel.
description.de: "Der Oberst und die Vögel" - ist eine weibliche Version des Originals "Der Oberst Vogel". Alle Charaktere sind Frauen, außer der Oberst.

languages.text:
